TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GifBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class GifBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定义用于编码图形交换格式 (GIF) 图像的编码器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 映像不支持全局预览、 全局缩略图、 全局元数据、 帧级缩略图或帧级元数据。 images do not support global preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, frame level thumbnails, or frame level metadata. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 映像并支持多个帧。 images do support multiple frames. 不能在部分信任环境中进行编码。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)有关部分信任的信息。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化以对新的位图图像进行编码。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[gifbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GifBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/GifEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[gifbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GifBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/GifEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[gifbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GifBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/GifEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
